bike.description: A2-SL custom-butted alloy w/ PowerCurve down tube, smooth welds, hydroformed top tube, tapered 1 1/8" - 1.5" head tube, BB91 bottom bracket. Rear triangle: A2-SL custom-butted alloy monostay w/ hydroformed chainstay, cold-forged dropout, post disc mount and replaceable hanger

components.description: Manitou Tower Comp TS air w/ tapered alloy steerer, lockout, 100mm travel
Shimano Deore, M590 w/ integrated spindle, 42/32/24T
Formula DC-20 front / DC-22 rear, 32H hubs w/ Vera Terra DPD22
Oval M100, alloy flat bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 710mm wide
Oval M213, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval M200 w/ satin steel rails
Oval M200, alloy double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 350mm
